content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's discuss the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm very interested in the apartment. It seems to be in a great location, close to all the amenities I need. How much are you asking for the rent?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, I appreciate your interest. Let's start with €1000 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €1000 seems like a fair starting point. I'd like to negotiate a bit lower, but I'm open to discussing the details. Is there any flexibility in the price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm willing to negotiate, but I must remind you that this apartment is in the city center and has all the amenities you need. I can go down to €950 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €950 is closer to what I had in mind. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would you be willing to go down a bit more?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I can go down to €900 per month, but I must insist that this is the lowest I can go. The apartment is in high demand, and I believe this price is more than fair.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €900 is a very good offer considering the location and the amenities. I'm willing to accept this price. I agree to the price of €900 Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [900] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
